## Installation

### Quick install
```bash
curl -fsSL https://zvault.cloud/install.sh | sh
```

### Cargo (crates.io)
```bash
cargo install zvault-cli
```

### npm
```bash
npx zvault --version
```

### Homebrew
```bash
brew install VanitasCaesar1/tap/zvault
```

### Docker
```bash
docker pull ghcr.io/vanitascaesar1/zvault:latest
```

### Build from source
```bash
cargo install --git https://github.com/VanitasCaesar1/zvault zvault-cli
```

## Checksums

See `checksums-sha256.txt` attached to this release.
